title: Forest Sounds - Audio Pack
description: 100 + High quality Forest Sounds for your game!
longDescription:
Hi There!


I'm proud to present my Forest Sounds Audio Pack. Here you'll find sounds that can probably happen on a forest in a game. Like monsters, monkey, antilopes, bonfire, fruits, and others!


Here's the full list:


  1. Antilope_01
  2. Bear_01
  3. Bear_Trap_01
  4. Bird_01
  5. Bonfire_01
  6. Dive_01
  7. Eat_Fruit_01
  8. FootStep_Dirt_01
  9. FootStep_Grass_01
  10. FootStep_Water_01
  11. Fruit_Drop_01
  12. Ghost_01
  13. Grass_Moving_01
  14. Hive_01
  15. Insects_01
  16. Monkey_01
  17. Owl_01
  18. Owl_02
  19. Pick_Up_Wood_01
  20. Rock_Drop_01
  21. Sit_Down_Leaves_01
  22. Sit_Down_Wood_01
  23. Tiger_01
  24. Tree_Fall_01
  25. Tree_Monster_01
  26. Tree_Monster_02
  27. Tree_Monster_03
  28. Tree_Monster_04
  29. Tree_Monster_05
  30. Vine_01
  31. Wind_01
  32. Wood_Chopping_01
  33. Wood_Creak_01
  34. Wood_Hit_01


Check the preview

Check the documentation
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 103

Number of Audio Cues: 103

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The Bonfire has a Start, loop and end sound

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation
